    • Method Detail

      • copyAsync

        public static <T> T copyAsync(T o,
                              Persister persister)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a copy of the given object o by serializing it with the given Persister. What copy means in this context, dependents fully on the Persister implementation.
        Parameters:
        o - the object you wish to copy
        persister - the Persister to use for the serialization process
        Returns:
        a copy of o
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if some errors occur during the serialization process

      • copy

        public static <T> T copy(T o,
                         Persister persister,
                         java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Create a copy of the given object o through serialization unsing the given persister.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of o
        Parameters:
        o - the object to copy
        persister - the persister to use for serialization and deserialization.
        clazz - the class to cast the deserialized object to
        Returns:
        a copy of o, as implemented by the given persister
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
